interface.name: InputMethodListener
interface.javadoc:
The listener interface for receiving input method events. A text editing component has to install an input method event listener in order to work with input methods.

The text editing component also has to provide an instance of InputMethodRequests. JavaSoft Asia/Pacific InputMethodEvent java.awt.im.InputMethodRequests 1.2
Invoked when the text entered through an input method has changed.
Invoked when the caret within composed text has changed.
